Reviews.Title: “Good value, tucked away on a back street by the Nieuwe Kerk.”
Reviews.Author: RonTSmithers_B_C_
Reviews.Content: reasonably priced business hotel clot 3 metro stops sagrada familia easy cheap get sites metro pass trendy tasteful got big room tv big wardrobe great bathroom hotel generally spotless breakfast plenty offer though get early get bacon happy egg bacon like request maid came round daily clean fresh towels location would call local area quiet night plenty little local shops need metro less 5 mins walk away youre couple friends want nice affordable place stay away crowds stag parties la rambla perfect metro runs till 2am sat sun problems want night cabs cheap want drop centre town wouldnt worry getting clot read bad reviews obviously going hotel renovated say great certainly feels superior three star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good value and location”
Reviews.Author: DJR249
Reviews.Content: great hotel went couple girlfriends get break break got hotel clean peaceful needed however get hot summer though hotel airconditioning doesnt work desired blast hotel ideal tourists students want weekend break hustle bustle london highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: AnonymousEssex
Reviews.Content: returned three nights catalonia aragon booked trip present husband bit worried reading reviews site need im glad say arrived 11pm girl reception perfectly pleasant polite whole time even smiled contrary info reviews hotel built around corner rooms difficult find couldnt find went back reception ask someone came us public areas hotel seen bit better days trying tidy bit notice reception effect one walls painted public areas also used store rooms mattresses towels didnt mention staff dont know whether usual rooms fine wasnt huge plenty room two us everything clean tidy bed comfy loads hot water heating control worked maid gave us clean towels new toiletries every day breakfast 730 1030 every day 730 til 11 sunday everything could want eat hot cold staff restaurant smiled much way bars restaurants right hotel pass plenty walk 2 streets back hotel toward familia price paid believe got good value would happy stay drawback distance ramblas place catalunya etc tended breakfast leave day came back evening meal 11pm staying bit central may gone back hotel late afternoon bit rest instead find bar tasty tapas smooth red wine

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location for this quite nice hotel.”
Reviews.Author: AlisonWombourne
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights late august 2004 found staff hard work helpful rooms small clean comfortable make sure get breakfast early refused breakfast 20 minutes supposed close tip take map taxi drivers could find place drop wrong area maps available reception bit way location close metro clot

Reviews.Title: “nice location”
Reviews.Author: 4apa
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights recently hotel 10 mins walk side street las ramblas distance port excellent location exploring barcelona plenty reasonable little restaraunts area working class area get real local spanish feel area rooms clean 3 4 english speaking channels tv breakfast good staff helpful speak good english lovely hotel would stay would highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: gempodge
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel short break friends excellent location far away la ramblas avoid crowd still within walking distance careful walking carrer de sant night subject several attempts pick friendly locals daytime street fine hotel modern gym sauna didnt use room although small comfortable clean bathroom modern lovely power shower rear facing room looked onto rear another building wasnt ideal much time actually spend room bed comfortable really matters negative lack teacoffee making facilities staff polite helpful especially checkout problem rate charged one rooms fairness guys desk realised mistake sorted quickly us great hotel one id definitely consider using price right

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel location in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: PDXfrequenttraveler
Reviews.Content: stayed mini break barcelona hotel 10 minute walk las ramblas either head slightly dodgy side street save couple minutes walk bottom las ramblas another main road room lovely clean great staff exceptionally helpful cannot thank enough help advice downside room main road double glazing quite noisy sirens general traffic night

Reviews.Title: “Small but Sweet”
Reviews.Author: RSan70
Reviews.Content: must use hotel want 10 min walk la rambla marina area excellent location public routes bus stop directly outside metro parallel less minute walk away hotel small modern lovely roof terrace overlooking city 4 star would say 2 3 star clean modern rooms beds uncomfortable small stayed twin room back hotel meant hardly street noise soundproofing hotel poor spent first 2 nights kept awake loud man next room reported reception next 2 nights one else booked room next door hear metro stops midnight got used first sockets wall loose extra care taken rooms didnt teacoffee making facilities greatly missed especially long day reception staff pleasant breakfast area looked inviting although didnt try expensive read lot reports prior arriving barcelona stating area hotel situated el somewhere desired bit dodgy however thought great location order get main sights plenty bars places eat thoroughly recommend los corner breakfast evening meal bar across street drink cheap quiet spoilt choice sant market 10 minute walk away two women travelling together time felt uncomfortable walking carrer de sant taken short cut la rambla hotel half way street felt unsafe wouldnt recommend walking night local people friendly public transport frequent cheap clean city full things see bored cant wait return

Reviews.Title: “Old fashioned”
Reviews.Author: Caitlin H
Reviews.Content: good hotel fairly good price located one rough parts old town part old town perhaps never felt one locations close street leads la rambla de nice open long plaza middle quarter way big la rambla central barcelona foot 15 minute walk hotel la rambla central barcelona never breakfast hotel ate cafes across street hotel great feel touristic touch local life recommend hotel look nice place stay city break use facilities cant say anything staff reception kind helpful

Reviews.Title: “Excellent quality hotel in the best location”
Reviews.Author: tinylass
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights good staff excellent spoke english well helped us find good restaurants area good sea food touristic ones serve less authentic food rooms hotel clean furnishings looked new nothing broken anything needed close metro recommend taking rather bus buses confusing metro clear takes everywhere

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing for a Best Western”
Reviews.Author: Norman C
Reviews.Content: spent 2 days hotel picking cruise ship read reviews sure expect found location central metro 100 yards away pleasent 15 min walk las ramblas hotel room little basic clean bathrooms excellent buffet breakfast good surrounding area lots places eat one reviews mentioned feeling safe area could understand walked night felt perfectly wanting get port take metro parallel 1 stop cross pickup bus takes cost 3 euro much cheaper taxi would recommend staying couple nights good medium range hotel staying longer would maybe want larger hotel amenities pleased choice

Reviews.Title: “Central hotel, great value”
Reviews.Author: redjockey
Reviews.Content: service facilities open 9pm strange reason make use gym 9pm mean close 8pm even earlier dont make dont try arguing supposed still open dont care area asking get main strip advised take streets neighbourhood behind hotel crime proof eating dinner block patio got robbed 2 guys rooms fairly clean small worth money way better hotels money trust spend extra 20 night worth

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great service!”
Reviews.Author: viajero_chica
Reviews.Content: room bit small big windows opened onto street fun watching activity clean modern room tight squeeze free internet made inconvenience close metro also walkable many areas city

Reviews.Title: “Gr8 location, poor room”
Reviews.Author: MojcaV
Reviews.Content: planned staying european cruise unfortunately day flew europe could even fly barcelona fly paris going take train barcelona left trains still going however got paris transportation spain strike could get hotel acknowledged aware care would refund money top three rooms booked name night im cost three rooms since two weeks return cancelled second reservation found great holiday inn stay barcelona close everything reading others reviews unsafe conditions hotel im glad didnt stay however said knowing getting trying cancel day advance hotel charged

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, helpful staff!”
Reviews.Author: eurotraveler32
Reviews.Content: first time visiting spain wasnt trip 2nd day barcelona got pick las ramblas daylight spent rest afternoon making police report station staying hotel wasnt better booked family room turns ordinary room pull cot corner decor bathrooms outdated housekeeping keeps toiletries forgot wash tub basin hair sand trip beach previous day front desk staff friendly helpful one extremely rude didnt like fact kids used business center check emails break bill change told didnt smaller since getting robbed provide map barcelona guests basically dont expect service didnt mind walk concern first read reviews hotel wouldnt recommend going late night area didnt look safe glad didnt book hotel breakfast theres lots inexpensive cafes nearby bus metro also close needed pros hotel cute solarium jacuzzi top deck well spa center basement private requires advance reservation return back barcelona future would definitely stay hotel pay better service location room

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location & Not Bad on Price”
Reviews.Author: ukkylie
Reviews.Content: travel frequently returned three night stay days ago hotel unsafe area lots immediately behind hotel even desk staff warned walking area day night triple room tiny two twin beds one cot together would fit store suitcases closet room walk floor beds hard rooftop hot tub deck open 930 close 700 exception cant even enjoy walking around city reviews say far everything totally correct take city transportation close positive tourist bus okay get anything tourist list stay hotel reason

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: RossLyon
Reviews.Content: booked standard room expedia night economy didnt realize checkin expedia receipt says double room without standard economy desk tried give economy room immediately switched standard explained mistake nice hotel edge central barcelona probably little mile walk ramblas modern interior fair amount room nice bathroom large sink plenty counter space bathtub tub name small fine shower two single beds pushed together make kingsized bed plenty room sleep small 20 flat screen tv bbc world news english speakers free internet access interior room quiet without traffic noise definitely worth extra 8 larger room walked ramblas gothic museum far town close metro stop easy arrival plane took aerobus placa espanya 20 meters metro station parallel two stops away front desk staff helpful located decent great neighborhood several restaurants fruit supermarket within 5 minute walk great place stay saving 100 per night central locations

Reviews.Title: “Very good location”
Reviews.Author: radulr
Reviews.Content: stayed one night prior leaving cruise although hotel centrally located much else like found staff okay overly helpful friendly rooms small could see air conditioning one family suites windows hot even though cool outside located balcony dining room making noisy morning arrived breakfast ended 1130 turned away even though buffet set could even get cup coffee cruise stayed hotel fira palace blocks away much better hotel better value try rather

Reviews.Title: “We hated this place!”
Reviews.Author: Eleanor23_11
Reviews.Content: husband spent couple days 10th wedding anniversary absolutely hotel expense decor furnishings etc hot tub absolute treat staff friendly helpful reception staff attractive men dressed smart made nice change hotel two blocks 1015 minute walk las ramblas theres supermarket across road handy room minibar filled could need drinks snacks would highly recommend place

Reviews.Title: “Good Value in a Great Location”
Reviews.Author: JP1975
Reviews.Content: arrived early evening one night stay prior cruise staff made us welcome provided us city map details keep personal belongings safe hotel bedroom bathroom spotlessly clean found several useful left us eg travel shower cap soap shower gel shoe clean kit etc window problem street found several bars restaurants enjoyed nice evening little street enjoyed good hotel buffet breakfast priced plenty choice served immaculate dining room hotel situated within short distance la ramblas walked next morning would recommend walking back streets night able leave luggage room midday found convenient read poor reviews hotel delighted stay comfortable well run establishment certainly recommend happy stay next barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Location! Location!”
Reviews.Author: Traveling_Lady_2004
Reviews.Content: say reading less complementary comments expecting dirty hotel every corner hostel level hotel may 4 star standard standard say stayed 4 star hotels london would never compare lovely hotel reception inviting one person pointed bar close 9pm problem many lovely restaurants nearby fact receptionist pointed us lovely place expensive rooms comfortable clean well maintained met friends came back hotel drink brought us bottle champagne celebrate bar staff put ice bucket even though purchased would definitely recommend hotel say never saw area hassle us ramblas would expect

Reviews.Title: “Average at best”
Reviews.Author: SaliB
Reviews.Content: little worried area reading reviews wrong hotel lovely area fine staff friendly helpful 5 minute walk ramblas main square back streets fine day apparently bit evening avoided 15 minutes go main road dont fancy walk theres tube outside take 13 euros 10 euros 2 days unlimited travel well worth want see whole city anyway book youll great time

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: holly1985
Reviews.Content: husband stayed aug 2nd sept reading reviews slightly location hotel arrival impressed hotel location seemed fine located theatre district quite busy evenings told watch pickpockets barcelona hotel receptionist gave us information sheet ways keep safe around city visiting anywhere take short cuts walk little side streets night although feel safe day getting la ramblas took 15 minutes main route going port turning left short walk another main road bottom la ramblas rooms hotel massive adequate clean comfortable maid service towels changed everyday air conditioning worked fine us spanish hotels english channel tv cnn comes barcelona watch tv worth getting taxi walking port olympic lovely restaurants especially like seafood also quite lively late evening although bars expensive bus tour barcelona also worth 19 euros get many times like 9pm also 3 different bus routes definatley worth money overall excellent weekend would definatly visit city hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, great location!”
Reviews.Author: ayvdm
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 21st july overall found hotel good standard extremely helpful staff spoke excellent english would go back probably rooms clean pleasant stayed 5th floor problem noise traffic outside air conditioning essential given temperatures worked well apart cnn english language channels tv frank spent relatively little time room breakfast pretty good offering varied selection excellent quality rooftop sun terrace also claimed bar didnt seem open visit problem given proximity plenty decent places near try directly opposite good tapas problem hotel first night close proximity another guest extremely loud seemingly drunk luckily second day hotel staff apologetic rest time oasis calm hotel located could best described fairly mixed residential neighbourhood particularly picturesque advantage making feel part local culture rather tourist big plus 1015 minute walk old port la ramblas main sites also within walking distance direct routes la go though better still pretty unpleasant example come hotel turn left walk along carrer sant home church worth visit particularly near rambla del realise far area prostitutes visible even midday one kindly local warned us walked watch could imagine tourists easy words advice dont carry bag camera display walking go towards port la ramblas monument take longer route via sant come las ramblas placa de catalunya couple tips bus offers superb value allowing hop visit main sites nearest stops hotel place de catalunya old port barcelona full bars places eat former particularly liked famous top las ramblas latter de tapas placa sant could stayed day also area old port avoid quite expensive places front visit top floor restaurant de catalunya fantastic views together reasonably priced quality food drink

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Location”
Reviews.Author: ArnaldoKF
Reviews.Content: hotel situated quite conveniently ramblas 1015 mins walk unfortunately room right road twin rooms booked 7th june fri young women used travelling one ex air arrived got taxi outside hotel girlfriend pulled back young man around 23 tried take bag course ruined holiday us another woman party staying different hotel calle walked calle san towards hotel similar also bag think 4 hotel least security outside sort double glazing could sleep spanish people appear come back night clubs around 4am morning go night however bedroom nice clean modern appearance breakfast could better indeed departure items replenished buffet next time stay closer ramblas 2 star hotel take difficult carry mobile phones body might good

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Carla_Tanaka
Reviews.Content: trip barcelona stayed hotel renovated decorated well nice facilities including sauna make reservations great location metro station covers two metro lines ferry cute informative young receptionists men bad thing made terrible stay giving keycard broke room 3 air conditioner work according temperature adjust hot room turn conditioner night long

Reviews.Title: “Good location - But pay by cash only :(”
Reviews.Author: Maddyfunk
Reviews.Content: stayed first week jan found reasonably well placed city honest sure hotels area better located even cheaper rooms fine nicely presented nightmare first night system must night making terrible noise wow tv rubbish dont try watch cnn english language almost us name night walk along hotel la rambla short walk route weird several parts hassle mind person city etc walk kinda enjoyed away la rambla heading dinner etc one good location simple walk main port nice walk day refreshing facilities bad simple comfortable bathroom toiletries provided good electronic safe passports etc free change lovely spa area downstairs sauna jacuzzi etc pool booking system honest didnt bother much barcelona great roof top solarium go sunshine reasonable views around city didnt even see bar area would plenty places interesting near thing never saw single guest kinda weird enjoy though great city cant go wrong

Reviews.Title: “it was alright for us...”
Reviews.Author: marwa87
Reviews.Content: stayed first days january room fine clean warm asked air conditioning told didnt also room beside elevator made bit night staff friendly helpful hotel located close las ramblas metro stations area around hotel bit dodgy get taxis back night fine day though

Reviews.Title: “Mixed Feelings & a Mixed Review”
Reviews.Author: MyZiggyMan
Reviews.Content: party 5 staying 3 rooms hotel christmas new year december 2006 hotel well located 510 mins walk la rambla cost average night double room including breakfast pretty good considering city centre location however would definitely rate hotel 3star rather 4star local area little seedy great problem walked hotel day night without problems rooms ok spacious modern clean though one room constantly hot last morning hot water available throughout hotel buffet breakfast good quite expensive reduced prebooked warned stay get charged breakfast even dont take tiny bar found open lot time hotel staff fine spoke good english ok hotel would like try somewhere else return barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Quiet, Safe, Clean, Reasonable Price - Now Best Western”
Reviews.Author: DileepB
Reviews.Content: feel nicely sized rooms extremely clean modern marble bathrooms center business center good breakfast room didnt breakfast guests said good hotel positive vibe makes feel right home stayed places barcelona cleanest welcoming staff reception extremely helpful made loads reservations restaurants us recommended great places answer every question truly made effort please stayed many 5 star first class hotels around world even though expected basic couldnt find fault anything isnt park budget truly next best thing fast roomy elevators good marble well hallways metro 200 metres away ramblas short walking distance cafes fried chicken street bother city full delicious tapas restaurants barcelona unfriendly taxi drivers shop staff rather serve wonderful place come home might design hotel furniture carpets rooms bit dark everything else light clean modern paid far money hotels barcelona nowhere near standard unless treat design next time returning recommend anyone going barcelona great value money everything looked exactly good choice trip may business pleasure

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location,good value,clean & friendly.”
Reviews.Author: Jacqui1823
Reviews.Content: stayed twice 2005 2006 occasions found clean efficient helpful english speaking staff obviously everyone wants something different hotel wanted somewhere clean modern safe central cheap boxes didnt take breakfast would barcelona full great little restaurants cafes rooms speak 2 weve stayed clean modern serviced high standard complaint really rooms front hotel bit noisy side front main dont think windows double glazed posted previously mentioned hotels location ok ramblas 1 stop away metro 1 min walk 5 min walk safety area say feels central london city sat night

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: tyljam5
Reviews.Content: quiet location busy area near dam square easy walk train station

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money, would have expected a better standard both from room and staff”
Reviews.Author: janbananOslo
Reviews.Content: hotel located one main roads leading central station 10 minute walk around corner dam square convenient breakfast included sufficient rooms sparse dont expect probably satisfied housekeeping leaves something 7 nights may vacuumed room 1 time rooms dusty dust though bathroom clean hotel good value accommodations amsterdam overpriced

Reviews.Title: “Nice quite hotel in perfectly central location”
Reviews.Author: jean0815
Reviews.Content: stayed one night hotel room spacious clean bathroom well appointed rooms teacoffee making facilities albeit bit limited plastic cups hotel reception staff helpful buffet breakfast nice plenty choice hotel convenient location short walk central station close would definitely recommend short break

Reviews.Title: “nothing wrong with it”
Reviews.Author: EJF212
Reviews.Content: clean basic hotel nice tidy room comfortable beds shower bit slow got clean breakfast continental got day started much view buildings hotel bedroom warm good working tv quite choice languages including bbc1 hotel lacked luxury certainly made excellent location right heart amsterdam 1015 minute walk centraal station dont go taxi charged us 15 euros extra 5 top luggage plenty eating establishments nearby yes enjoyable easter break

Reviews.Title: “Great location for an average hotel, but not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: NorthWalesTrekker
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel two night takes 10 minutes go hotel walk street small lot people make noise staff helpful tea maker room wifi internet good room clear bed comfortable bathroom good clean breakfast modest bad minus hotel took 50 euro guarantee fee

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good 3 star”
Reviews.Author: raj037
Reviews.Content: hotel real gem clean great value best yards dam square heart also friendly made pleasant 5 10 min walk central station links airport would defo recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, nice surroundings”
Reviews.Author: Phylomela
Reviews.Content: best western dam square inn downtown amsterdam nicely located within walking distance main train station train access points around city close access canal cruises shopping streets reception staff always helpful nearby number good restaurants pubs check sushi restaurant

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel,Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: mandyryan
Reviews.Content: hotel right center city 5 minutes walking city rail station connecting airport europe tram connections canal cruise shopping street restaurants tour close staff helpful kind room small overall stay pleasant

Reviews.Title: “Very central, pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: WanderingAngeus
Reviews.Content: arrived amsterdam 2 january streets amsterdam filthy everywhere walked central station hotel bad instructions get worked arrived street shocked quite found hotel wasnt bad rest surroundings rooms quite old fashioned carpets dated two single beds pushed together hate hardly romantic curtains winter sun still made room cold unfriendly towels size bath home could hardly around buffet breakfast cereal toast

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in the centre of Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: yorkie1973
Reviews.Content: stayed one night hotel mini cruise amsterdam chose mainly location staying 2 days around corner dam within easy walking distance everything flat city lots walking hotel extremely nice exceptionally clean staff welcoming friendly spoke good english rooms quite large great big comfy bed made even better us tiny single beds ferry across great rooms everything could need including flat screen tv tea coffee making facilities safe shower gel shampoo bathroom breakfast nice didnt much choice hotels stayed including best overall great choice hotel highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “great location-comfortable bed”
Reviews.Author: tamarara65
Reviews.Content: often use best western hotels one usual standard friendly helpfull staff made otherwise poor hotel acceptable continental buffet breakfast good excellent service note actual restaurant hotel breakfast small bar reception area excellent location right next new church cathedral dam square good sightseeing restaurants catching trams etc room rather cramped lighting dim next impossible read books maps etc view window damp light well bed comfortable bathroom supplied kettle coffee etc spacious clean nice hotel need getting bit warned email booking lift use hotel reservations staff us room 1st floor get climb many stairs baggage nice warned direct access hotel taxi 50 euros airport dropped us end road walk last 80 meters rain

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: lolacola23
Reviews.Content: stayed mid december 2 nights central hotel less minutes walk dam square hotel clean room good teacoffee making facilities breakfast ok ladies reception pleasant helpful many hotels stayed amsterdam far nicest money 15 minutes walk centraal station definitely back soon note lift currently updated use stairs steep many fixed new year

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, central hotel, great value”
Reviews.Author: shibby
Reviews.Content: stayed best western weekend november service received excellent helpful friendly receptionists rooms clean nice lots space considering majority hotels amsterdam bit hotel little street dam square away noise still accessible everywhere plus pizza shop lovely little bakery right across hotel couple require go back amsterdam wouldnt hesitate go back hotel really couldnt fault

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Peak District National Park, United Kingdom
Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: vjcc80
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights end september hotel location steps dam square first shopping street hotel staff friendly helpfull rent bikes 24 hours ok continental food room clean realy old poor decoration weather fantastic spend time room inconvenient bakery cross street pleasant good coffee

Reviews.Title: “depends on what you want”
Reviews.Author: pieszynski
Reviews.Content: hotel convenient location friendly staff great breakfast staying

Reviews.Title: “very disappointing, shabby”
Reviews.Author: IrelandVacation
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night beginning september family trip hotel within short walking distance things would want need amsterdam yes tucked way small alley however great places visit amsterdam map locate hotel greatest ease rooms exactly would expect best western clean comfortable ideal got exactly expecting though cant air conditioning sorry stayed another 15 hotels one 3 adults room single bed wall room tea coffee facilities safe free wifi standard tv stations including bbc1 well clean bathroom decent sized shower certainly plus europe bar lobby though didnt take advantage arrived early luggage happy though wait 1 front desk person deal almost everything lady checked us extremely helpful directions maps transportation questions asked also recommended variety places eat dinner evening yes hotel little hotels europe hotel right center beautiful amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “GOOD VALUE”
Reviews.Author: BOBSAWAY
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights location good plenty shops restaurants around hotel within 5 minutes dam square major shopping streets anne frank also 10 minutes walk away hotel busy one person front reception sometimes difficult get service rooms okay little tired basic storage available arrive early like sunday morning street view room great tended little noisy

Reviews.Title: “A Great Hotel in a Central Location”
Reviews.Author: Shaz E
Reviews.Content: stayed sept 11 river cruise happy choice reason hard get room amsterdam particular day many places fully booked ones available extremely overpriced finding hotel euros bargain believe room bathroom clean decent size though bit outdated bed great ok actually quite happy didnt get street view since whole immediate vicinity around dam square many bars restaurants partying goes late night breakfast good staff person dealt extremely nice helpful walk train station morning go took minutes

Reviews.Title: “fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: youngnewlywedNewry
Reviews.Content: stayed dam square inn august two day break hotel great location expensive considering standard hotel rooms ok bit tired decor breakfast quite poor staff friendly incredibly noisy pair men opposite room one night quite scary shouting led poor nights sleep ring reception much could done wouldnt stay simply due cost

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: tyroLisbon
Reviews.Content: family four stayed best western dam square inn one night arrived warm summer day long flight air conditioned rooms cool comfortable clean quiet two rooms located near hotel located quiet street busy neighborhood found location convenient safe enjoyed breakfast hotel good first night

Reviews.Title: “Super City Hotel”
Reviews.Author: R0b0c0p
Reviews.Content: travel amsterdam several times year business place stay much magical rooms nice nothing special internet fast cheap staff simply amazing know name always super friendly helpful fun

Reviews.Title: “Perfect little hotel”
Reviews.Author: spelpa
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel golden tulip years ago quite enjoyed location really good right beside dam square easy reach restaurants pubs cafes shopping streets stayed one night trip ok room clean bed fairly comfortable breakfast left lot desired first hotel wanting us pay internet 2 week 6 hotel tour holland would recommend hotel family friends go looking reasonably priced clean place stay central one

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Rosielola
Reviews.Content: hotel close station walked 10mins hotel hidden little side street quaint actually proved good sound break dam square around corner lots places eat drink nearby make sure go pasta great italian waiters visit stars found hotel staff called restaurants made bookings us recommended places visit dine negatives rooms little dingy window looked onto would definately book hotel great base arent even room explore amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “great little hotel”
Reviews.Author: countryqueen
Reviews.Content: location best amsterdam near everything near trams busses supermarket dam square lively lot happening great restaurants outside hotel entrance lucky get suite hotel staff great friendly helpful negative free wifi advertised got charged 7 euro day wifi

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: AoifeMN
Reviews.Content: want everything walking distance amsterdam great hotel rooms clean seems safe mostly employees friendly breakfast hot dishes continental style could improved wifi available charged expensive

Reviews.Title: “Great location that is all”
Reviews.Author: Sparkes
Reviews.Content: went birthday trip march 2011 staff friendly helpful catered request would recommend friends family would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: interested82
Reviews.Content: hotel good neat location good amsterdam locations good could walk around city come back breakfast wide spread sweet n simple bit expensive given size room

Reviews.Title: “Just OK”
Reviews.Author: G&JV
Reviews.Content: room quiet clean smaller reasonably priced rooms ive stayed europe location allowed us walk everywhere train station museums breakfast included consisted bread sliced meat cheese orange juice juice milk kinds cereal yogurt coffee tea nice brasserie across street main negative point places nearby eating towards fast food great location shopping albert heijn grocery store couple blocks away next plaza wide selection cheese try buy

Reviews.Title: “great location excellent breakfast”
Reviews.Author: traveltortoise
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend trips germany hotel hard find alley behind church dam square signs main streets point right direction found mixed proximity dam square main train station tram lines excellent location alley little weird since right across always young people smoking pot street outside shop hotel old building atmosphere inside little run booked room two people weeks trip checkin told single room one person reserved able accomodate us give us room two irritating booked confirmed still wrong room tiny 2 twins together window mounted near ceiling use stick hook open close bathroom half size closet home shower tiny could hardly turn around ill honest first impression closer however room indeed clean mattresses incredibly comfortable initial shock make best especially since 3 nights youre looking certain level european charm space hotel youre looking clean room comfortable bed near dam square arent turned something lines private hostel room youll happy staff friendly helpful cant say id recommend hotel friends family would recommend young people looking stay near dam square train station dont plan spend much time room arent hung luxury amenities

Reviews.Title: “a place where you feel like family”
Reviews.Author: pleasure
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights complaints staff helpful good breakfast airport shuttle bus drops end alley pick point van hotel convenient location near dam square short walk central station rooms somewhat small comfortable entire hotel nonsmoking
